As I listened to Ian interview 3 russian dolls this morning it got me thinking how the same concept could make a potentially great game.
So here it is: Charades with words (not acting).
Pick an random object. Give it human feelings. Talk as if you see the world through their eyes.
Have a conversation with someone. Every two minutes, have them try to guess what you are.
Great for all those long summer car rides. (Your mileage may vary.)
